Vision.subtitle: Vision
Vision.text: We strive to ensure that every children's hospital in Ukraine becomes a place of joy and smiles for children who find themselves in difficult and crisis situations.

inclusivity.hoverText: we value everyone, regardless of their circumstances, and do our best to make everyone feel important and needed

proactivity.hoverText: we take action in advance, always looking for new ways to bring joy and relief

respect.hoverText: we treat everyone with deep respect, valuing the uniqueness of each individual

sincerity.hoverText: our actions and words always come from the heart, creating an atmosphere of trust

empathy.hoverText: we understand and feel what you feel, providing support in the most difficult moments

first.text:
Hospital Clowning:
 An Emotional Support Program for Children in Hospitals
first.hoverText: Boosting children's mood and morale. Facilitating adaptation to hospital conditions. Сompanying children for procedures or surgeries. Collaborating with parents and doctors

second.hoverText: Weekly Events. Bubble Shows. Winners' Games. Beauty Days. Art Therapy. Sound Therapy. Themed Concerts

third.hoverText: Training hospital clowns.  Conducting team building for the team with the support of the international community of hospital clowns.  We work with the emotional state of volunteers.  We promote and develop hospital clowning in Ukraine

first.text: To establish an Ukrainian Association of Hospital Clowns with colleagues from cities across Ukraine

second.text: To launch new teams in children's hospitals in Kyiv and other cities

third.text: To create a national program of emotional support in children's hospitals

School.join_title: Who Can Become a Hospital Clown?
School.main_text_primary: The Hospital Clowning School is a joint project of the BUP -
School.main_text_secondary: Bureau of Smiles and Support and 'Tabletochki'

join.paragraph_1: A person who understands what empathy is. Ready to accept and be aware of the emotions of those who need support. And provide this support according to the emotional needs of children and parents.
join.paragraph_2: Someone who is not afraid to be funny. To genuinely laugh at themselves and at this whimsical life. To laugh and love it above all.
join.paragraph_3: A person with charisma, who is ready to work on developing it.
join.paragraph_4: A person who is ready to learn, develop, and seek themselves, their comedic character. A person who is ready to create a celebration of life amid disaster.

training.title: Do you think there are more fun lessons than at the Hospital Clowning School?
training.text: We think not. Because here students play, dress in funny costumes, and dance. It's fascinating to watch how this clowning magic works when a group of adults, strangers to each other, transform into children and allow themselves to be what they feel like - light, genuine, silly, funny, anything!
training.paragraph_1: Volunteers undergo a two-day training in the basics of hospital clowning - in the course, students learn to express themselves, let out their inner child, not be afraid to be funny, and play with each other.
training.paragraph_2: Everyone can awaken the clown within themselves - a unique, interesting, funny character who not only explores the world around them but is also ready to dive into the unknown. This is the foundation with which they can work and visit the wards to see children.
training.paragraph_3: After the training, volunteers go to practice in the hospital, accompanied by experienced hospital clowns.
training.paragraph_4: Over the next three months, they meet for classes once a week and delve deeper into the mechanisms of hospital clowning.
training.paragraph_5: In parallel, regular visits to hospital wards occur under constant trainer supervision and psychological support.
